tool_description: Major golf tours, fixtures, results and up to the minute leaderboard data to enhance your applications.
name: Golf Leaderboard Data
title: Golf Leaderboard Data

api_list.name: PGA Scorecards
api_list.description: Provides scorecards for a given player in a given tournament
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/scorecard/220/101017"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/scorecard/{tourn_id}/{player_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Projected PGA Rankings
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to see the projected PGA rankings throughout a PGA event
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/projected-rankings-pga/2022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/projected-rankings-pga/{season}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: World Rankings
api_list.description: World Golf Rankings for players across all tours. Big file, shouldn't be queried often.
api_list.code:

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/world-rankings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tour Rankings
api_list.description: See player rankings accross the various tours given a `tour_id` and `season`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/tour-rankings/2/2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/tour-rankings/{tour_id}/{season}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Fixtures
api_list.description: Lists tournament fixtures for a given tour_id and season_id. You'll need to query the "Tours" endpoint to get the correct tour_id and season_id you're looking for.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures/2/2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/fixtures/{tour_id}/{season_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Entry List
api_list.description: Entry List for given tournament - query this to see who will be taking part.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Leaderboard
api_list.description: Lists information for a given tournament_id. Includes leaderboard and per player round information. Also includes live tournament status.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/leaderboard/25"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://golf-leaderboard-data.p.rapidapi.com/leaderboard/{tournament_id}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())
